actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to enhance disproportionate share hospital treatment for sole community hospitals under the Medicare program.
short_title: Helping Sole Community Hospitals Act of 2006

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise requirements for disproportionate share hospital treatment for sole community hospitals under the Medicare program.

titles.title: Helping Sole Community Hospitals Act of 2006
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to enhance disproportionate share hospital treatment for sole community hospitals under the Medicare program.
